bio: Rafsan Haque is a renowned chef from Dhaka, Bangladesh. he has been cooking Bangladeshi food for the past 12 years and has won numerous awards for her cooking. She loves to experiment with different ingredients and spices to create unique and flavorful dishes. In his free time, he enjoys gardening and spending time with his family.

Mohammed Rahman is a passionate chef from Chittagong, Bangladesh. He has been cooking Bangladeshi food for the past 11 years and loves to share his recipes with others. He specializes in seafood dishes and is known for his signature spicy shrimp curry. In his free time, he enjoys fishing and exploring new ingredients.

Tutul Hossain is a talented chef from Sylhet, Bangladesh. He has been cooking Bangladeshi food for the past 10 years and has a passion for creating healthy and nutritious dishes. He believes that food should not only taste good but also be good for you. In her free time, he enjoys hiking and exploring the outdoors.

Jhankar Mahbub is a highly accomplished chef from Dhaka, Bangladesh. He is widely renowned for his exceptional skills in cooking traditional Bangladeshi biryani dishes, and is considered an expert in this area. In addition to his culinary talents, Jhankar is also a prominent figure in the Bangladeshi web development community, serving as the CEO of Programming Hero and the senior most web developer in the country. He is deeply passionate about teaching programming and web development, and has inspired countless individuals to pursue careers in these fields.

Abdul Karim is a master chef from Khulna, Bangladesh. He has been cooking Bangladeshi food for the past 20 years and has won numerous awards for his cooking. He specializes in meat dishes and is known for his signature lamb curry. In his free time, he enjoys playing cricket and watching movies.

Taskin Ahmed is a rising star in the world of Bangladeshi cuisine. He has been cooking for the past 5 years and is known for his creative and innovative dishes. He loves to experiment with different ingredients and spices to create unique and flavorful dishes. In his free time, he enjoys reading and listening to music.
